title: If I made a maco to type "gj" in chat could that get me banned?
body: I just had the idea of making a maco on my keyboard to type stuff I say commonly in chat. Would that be against scripting/ using 3rd party software rules?

replies.body: If it were just a keyboard shortcut, I'm not sure that would fall under any of the points outlined in the [**third party faq **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848). Make sure to read over those points just to be safe, but as long you aren't using anything that gives you some type of advantage in-game, and you aren't using "gj" negatively, I'd think you'd be fine!
